articles.title: Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X or Grok among its top apps
articles.summary: Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in its App Store.
articles.translated_title: Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X or Grok among its top apps
articles.translated_summary: Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in its App Store.

articles.title: AMC CEO Says He Has Personally Abandoned Google In Exchange For ChatGPT: Here's How The Company Is Using Artificial Intelligence
articles.summary: AMC CEO Adam Aron revealed that he has switched from Google to OpenAI's ChatGPT and discussed how artificial intelligence is transforming the company's operations, driving growth, and fueling future investments.

articles.title: Trump opens door to sales of version of Nvidia's next-gen AI chips in China
articles.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday suggested he might allow Nvidia to sell a scaled-down version of its next-generation advanced GPU chip in China, despite deep-seated fears in Washington that China could harness U.S. artificial intelligence capabilities to supercharge its military.
articles.translated_title: Trump opens door to sales of version of Nvidia's next-gen AI chips in China

articles.title: Musk says xAI to take legal action against Apple over App Store rankings
articles.summary: Billionaire Elon Musk said on Monday his artificial intelligence startup xAI would take legal action against Apple , accusing the iPhone maker of breaching antitrust regulations in managing the App Store rankings.
articles.translated_title: Musk says xAI to take legal action against Apple over App Store rankings
articles.translated_summary: Billionaire Elon Musk said on Monday his artificial intelligence startup xAI would take legal action against Apple , accusing the iPhone maker of breaching antitrust regulations in managing the App Store rankings.

articles.title: Musk Accuses Apple of Antitrust Violation, Threatens Legal Action
articles.summary: Elon Musk says Apple is engaging in antitrust violations by allegedly making it impossible for any artificial intelligence company other than OpenAI to reach the No. 1 spot in its App Store rankings, calling it an unequivocal antitrust violation.
articles.translated_title: Musk Accuses Apple of Antitrust Violation, Threatens Legal Action
articles.translated_summary: Elon Musk says Apple is engaging in antitrust violations by allegedly making it impossible for any artificial intelligence company other than OpenAI to reach the No. 1 spot in its App Store rankings, calling it an unequivocal antitrust violation.

articles.title: Free AI training comes to California colleges - but at what cost?
articles.summary: As artificial intelligence replaces entry-level jobs, California‚Äôs universities and community colleges are offering a glimmer of hope for students: free AI training that will teach them to master the new technology.

articles.title: Cerence AI CEO explains how new tech can help drivers
articles.summary: In a Monday interview with CNBC's Jim Cramer, Cerence AI CEO Brian Krzanich explained how new artificial intelligence technology can help automobile drivers.
